sections.title: Syntactic\b\tateg\fry\bPredicti\fn\bf\fr\bImpr\fving\bTranslati\fn\bQuality\bin\b English-K\frean\bMachine\bTranslati\fn∗∗∗∗\b \b
paragraphs: sdkim@hansung.ac.kr\b Abstract.\b This\b pap\fr\b propos\fs\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b for\b improving\b translation\b quality.\bIn\bparsing\busing\bs\fnt\fnc\f\bs\fgm\fntation,\bth\f\bs\fgm\fnts\bar\f\bs\fparat\fly\bpars\fd\band\bth\fn\b th\f\b parsing\b r\fsults\b of\b \fach\b s\fgm\fnt\b ar\f\b combin\fd\b to\b g\fn\frat\f\b a\b global\b s\fnt\fnc\f\b structur\f.\b Th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b guid\fs\b th\f\b pars\fr\b to\b id\fntify\b r\flationships\b among\b s\fgm\fnts\band\bto\bs\fl\fct\bth\f\bcorr\fct\bparsing\br\fsults\bfor\b\fach\bs\fgm\fnt.\bW\f\bd\fsign\bf\fatur\fs\bfor\b pr\fdicting\bsyntactic\bcat\fgori\fs\band\bg\fn\frat\f\bd\fcision\btr\f\fs\bfor\bth\f\bpr\fdiction\busing\btraining\b data\b from\b th\f\b P\fnn\b Tr\f\fbank.\b In\b \fxp\frim\fnt,\b w\f\b show\b th\f\b pr\fdiction\b accuracy\b and\b comparison\br\fsults\bwith\bth\f\bpr\fdiction\bby\bhuman-built\brul\fs,\bh\furistic\bprobability\bfunction,\b and\b n\fural\b n\ftworks.\b Also,\b w\f\b pr\fs\fnt\b how\b much\b th\f\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b contribut\fs\b to\b improving\btranslation\bquality.\b Keyw\frds:\bmachin\f\btranslation,\bmachin\f\bl\farning,\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction.\b \b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\p\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b ∗\b This\br\fs\farch\bwas\bfinancially\bsupport\fd\bby\bHansung\bUniv\frsity\bin\bth\f\by\far\bof\b2009.\b \b

sections.title: 1 Intr\fducti\fn\b
paragraphs: R\fc\fnt\bEnglish-\tor\fan\bmachin\f\btranslation\bsyst\fms\bg\fn\frat\f\bgood\btranslation\bfor\bth\f\br\flativ\fly\b short\b s\fnt\fnc\fs.\b In\b th\f\b translation\b of\b long\b s\fnt\fnc\fs,\b th\f\b translation\b r\fsults\b ar\f\b bad,\b so\b th\f\b r\fad\frs\bhav\f\bdifficulty\bin\bund\frstanding\bth\f\bm\faning\bof\btranslat\fd\bs\fnt\fnc\fs.\bTh\f\bdifficulty\bin\b translating\blong\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\bis\bsyntactic\bon\f,\bwhil\f\bth\f\bprobl\fms\bin\bshort\bs\fnt\fnc\f\btranslation\bli\f\b in\b th\f\b s\fmantic\b ar\fa.\b That\b is,\b mor\f\b accurat\f\b parsing\b h\flps\b improv\f\b th\f\b r\fadability\b of\b th\f\b translation\br\fsults\bfor\blong\bs\fnt\fnc\fs.\bMost\blong\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\bconsist\bof\bcomma-s\fparat\fd\bphras\fs\b or\bclaus\fs.\bTh\f\baccurat\f\band\bd\ftail\fd\banalysis\bof\bth\f\br\flationships\bamong\bth\f\bcomma-s\fparat\fd\b \fl\fm\fnts\b can\b improv\f\b th\f\b parsing\b accuracy,\b r\fsulting\b in\b translation\b quality\b improv\fm\fnt.\b Of\b cours\f,\bth\f\bs\fmantic\bprobl\fms\bmust\bb\f\bconsid\fr\fd\bto\bimprov\f\bth\f\btranslation\bquality,\bbut\bth\fy\b ar\f\bnot\bscop\f\bof\bth\f\bpap\fr.\b

In\b(\tim,\b2005;\b\tim\b\ft\bal.,\b2001),\bth\fy\bpropos\fd\bintra-s\fnt\fnc\f\bs\fgm\fntation\bfor\bsp\f\fding\bup\b th\f\bsyntactic\banalysis\bof\blong\bs\fnt\fnc\fs.\bIn\bparsing\busing\bth\f\bs\fgm\fntation,\bth\f\binput\bs\fnt\fc\f\bis\b split\binto\bs\fv\fral\bshort\fr\bs\fgm\fnts\bby\bcommas\band\bth\f\babov\f\bintra-s\fnt\fnc\f\bs\fgm\fntation.\bTh\f\b s\fgm\fnts\bar\f\bpars\fd\bs\fparat\fly\band\bth\f\bparsing\br\fsults\bof\bs\fgm\fnts\bar\f\bcombin\fd.\bAft\fr\bparsing\b \fach\bs\fgm\fnt,\b a\b tr\f\f\b must\b b\f\b s\fl\fct\fd.\b So\b s\fv\fral\b s\fl\fction\b d\fcisions\b occur\b during\b parsing\b an\b input\bs\fnt\fnc\f.\bTh\f\bwrong\bs\fl\fction\baff\fcts\bth\f\btranslation\br\fsult.\bAs\ba\br\fsult,\bth\f\bintra-s\fnt\fnc\f\b s\fgm\fntation\b contribut\fd\b to\b sp\f\fding\b up\b th\f\b parsing\b but\b may\b mak\f\b littl\f\b improv\fm\fnt\b of\b translation\b quality.\b Also,\b it\b is\b difficult\b to\b consid\fr\b th\f\b long-distanc\f\b d\fp\fnd\fnci\fs\b amon\f\b s\fgm\fnts,\bwhich\bcan\bl\fad\bto\badditional\btranslation\b\frrors.\b

In\b ord\fr\b to\b improv\f\b translation\b quality\b by\b \b consid\fring\b long-distanc\f\b d\fp\fnd\fnci\fs\b and\b s\fl\fcting\bth\f\bcorr\fct\bparsing\br\fsults\bfor\b\fach\bs\fgm\fnt,\bthis\bpap\fr\bpropos\fs\ba\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b of\b comma-s\fparat\fd\b s\fgm\fnts.\b If\b w\f\b could\b know\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b of\b a\b giv\fn\b 710 23rd Pacific Asia Conference on Language, Information and Computation, pages 710–717 \b A\bsmall\bTCL\bint\frpr\ft\fr,\bwhich\bcan\bb\f\blink\fd\binto\bth\f\bcod\f,\bint\frpr\fts\bth\f\bstrings.\b

\b Translati\fn-1:\b작은(small)\b TCL\b인터프리터(int\frpr\ft\fr),\b그\b코드(cod\f)로\b 연결(link)될\b수\b있는\b\b것(which),\b그\b문자열(strings)을\b해석한다(int\frpr\fts).\b Translati\fn-2:\b그\b코드(cod\f)로\b연결(link)될\b수\b있는\b작은(small)\b TCL\b 인터프리터(int\frpr\ft\fr)는\b그\b문자열(strings)을\b해석한다(int\frpr\fts).\b s\fgm\fnt\bb\ffor\f\bparsing,\bw\f\bcan\bguid\f\bpars\fr\bin\bconsid\fring\bs\fgm\fnt\bd\fp\fnd\fnci\fs\band\bs\fl\fcting\b th\f\bcorr\fct\bparsing\br\fsults.\bTh\f\bpr\fdiction\bmust\bb\f\bmad\f\bb\ffor\f\bparsing\busing\bonly\binformation\b from\bl\fxical\banalysis.\bA\bs\fnt\fnc\f\bis\bsplit\bby\bcommas,\band\bth\fn\bth\f\blong\bs\fgm\fnts\bar\f\bagain\bsplit.\b W\f\b try\b to\b pr\fdict\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b of\b th\f\b comma-s\fparat\fd\b s\fgm\fnts.\b This\b pr\fv\fnts\b pr\fdicting\bcat\fgori\fs\bof\bth\f\bnon-constitu\fnt\bphras\fs\bfrom\bth\f\bs\fcond\bs\fgm\fntation\bst\fp.\bIn\bthis\b pap\fr,\b w\f\b construct\b rul\fs\b and\b functions\b for\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b by\b th\f\b statistical\b and\b machin\f\b l\farning\b m\fthods.\b W\f\b g\fn\frat\f\b training\b data\b using\b th\f\b P\fnn\b Tr\f\fbank\b corpus\b (Marcus\b\ft\bal.,\b1993).\b

S\fction\b2\bd\fscrib\fs\bth\f\bparsing\bm\fthod\busing\bs\fnt\fnc\f\bs\fgm\fntation\band\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\b pr\fdiction.\b W\f\b \fxplain\b th\f\b g\fn\fration\b st\fps\b of\b rul\fs\b and\b functions\b for\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\bin\bs\fction\b3.\bS\fction\b4\bshows\bth\f\bcomparison\br\fsults\bof\bpr\fdiction\baccuraci\fs\band\bth\f\b d\fgr\f\f\bof\bth\f\btranslation\bquality\bimprov\fm\fnt.\bS\fction\b5\bconclud\fs\bth\f\bpap\fr.\b

sections.title: 2 Related\bW\frks\b&\bParsing\bMeth\fd\b
paragraphs: Th\f\b partial\b parsing\b by\b Abn\fy\b (Abn\fy,\b 1991)\b was\b us\fd\b in\b analyzing\b noun\b phras\fs\b and\b pr\fpositional\bphras\fs\band\bwas\br\fgard\fd\bas\ban\borigin\bfor\bfast\bparsing.\bIn\b(\tim\band\b\tim,\b1995),\b th\fy\bpropos\fd\bs\fnt\fnc\f\bpatt\frns\bin\bparsing\bEnglish\bs\fnt\fnc\fs.\bTh\f\bm\fthod\bwas\b\fff\fctiv\f\bfor\bth\f\b s\fnt\fnc\fs\b match\fd\b with\b th\f\b d\ffin\fd\b patt\frns.\b How\fv\fr,\b th\f\b cov\frag\f\b of\b th\f\b s\fnt\fnc\f\b patt\frns\b was\bv\fry\blow\bfor\bpractical\busag\f.\bIn\b(\tim\b\ft\bal.,\b2001;\b\tim\band\b\tim,\b1997),\bth\f\bintra-s\fnt\fnc\f\b s\fgm\fntation\band\bth\f\bm\fthod\bof\bpartial\bparsing\bw\fr\f\bus\fd\bto\bimprov\f\bparsing\b\fffici\fncy.\b

In\bg\fn\fral,\blong\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\bconsist\bof\bcomma-s\fparat\fd\bs\fgm\fnts.\b Th\f\b s\fgm\fnts\b hav\f\b som\f\b rol\fs\b in\b a\b s\fnt\fnc\f\b which\b ar\f\b d\ft\frmin\fd\b by\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b of\b \fach\b s\fgm\fnt.\b Th\f\b pr\fdict\fd\bcat\fgory\bcan\bb\f\bconsid\fr\fd\bin\bid\fntifying\br\flationships\bamong\bs\fgm\fnts\band\bcan\bh\flp\b s\fl\fct\ba\bcorr\fct\bparsing\br\fsult\bfor\b\fach\bs\fgm\fnt.\b\b

Th\fr\f\b ar\f\b som\f\b works\b on\b th\f\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction.\b Most\b works\b ar\f\b for\b th\f\b word\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b in\b th\f\b spok\fn\b languag\f\b analysis.\b Th\fy\b us\fd\b n\fural\b n\ftwork\b (Nakamura,\b 1995),\b ngrams,\b and\b so\b on.\b Oth\frs\b works\b r\ff\frr\fd\b th\f\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b as\b part-of-sp\f\fch\b tagging.\b Th\fr\f\bar\f\bmany\br\fs\farch\fs\babout\bPOS\btagging.\bTh\fy\bus\f\bHMM,\bn\fural\bn\ftworks,\bn-grams,\band\b probabilistic\bm\fthods\b(Nivr\f,\b2000;\bSchmid,\b1994).\bBut\bthis\bpap\fr\bfocus\fs\bon\bth\f\bpr\fdiction\bof\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgori\fs\b of\b comma-s\fparat\fd\b s\fgm\fnts.\b In\b th\f\b lit\fratur\f,\b th\fr\f\b ar\f\b f\fw\b r\fs\farch\fs\babout\bth\f\bprobl\fm\bof\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction.\b

\b Figur\f\b1\bshows\bth\f\b\fxampl\fs\bof\bcomma-s\fparat\fd\bs\fgm\fnts,\bth\f\bcat\fgori\fs\bof\bth\f\bs\fgm\fnts,\band\b possibl\f\b translations.\b In\b Figur\f\b 1,\b [Translation-1]\b is\b a\b translation\b r\fsult\b without\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction.\bIn\bth\f\btranslation\bNP\b(noun\bphras\f)\br\fsult\bis\bs\fl\fct\fd\bfor\b[S\fgm\fnt-1],\bSENT\br\fsult\b is\bfor\b[S\fgm\fnt-2],\band\bVP\br\fsult\bis\bfor\b[S\fgm\fnt-3].\bTh\f\bs\fl\fction\bfor\b[S\fgm\fnt-2]\bis\bwrong,\b but\b th\f\b \frror\b can\b b\f\b \fasily\b solv\fd\b by\b modifying\b som\f\b scor\fs\b in\b th\f\b scoring\b syst\fm.\b But\b this\b solution\b int\frf\fr\fs\b with\b th\f\b scoring\b syst\fm.\b W\f\b can\b g\ft\b corr\fct\b translation\b as\b [Translation-2]\b 711 wh\fn\b w\f\b id\fntify\b modification\b r\flation\b b\ftw\f\fn\b [S\fgm\fnt-1]\b and\b [S\fgm\fnt-2]\b and\b choos\f\b RLCL\br\fsult\bfor\b[S\fgm\fnt-2]\bby\bpr\fdicting\bits\bcat\fgory\bas\bRLCL.\b

Th\f\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bh\flps\bto\bid\fntify\br\flationship\bb\ftw\f\fn\bs\fgm\fnts\band\bs\fl\fct\b a\bcorr\fct\bparsing\br\fsult\b for\b a\b giv\fn\b s\fgm\fnt\b without\b aff\fcting\b \fxisting\b pars\fr.\b Figur\f\b 2\b shows\b th\f\b parsing\b st\fps\b with\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction.\b Aft\fr\b s\fgm\fntation\b by\b commas,\b syntactic\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bis\bp\frform\fd\bon\b\fach\bs\fgm\fnt.\bTh\fr\f\bar\f\b\fxc\fptions\bin\bwhich\bth\f\b commas\b ar\f\b not\b us\fd\b to\b s\fparat\f\b phras\fs.\b For\b \fxampl\f,\b in\b “a\b v\fry\b h\favy,\b \fxp\fnsiv\f\b book”,\b n\fith\fr\b“a\bv\fry\bh\favy”\bor\b“\fxp\fnsiv\f\bbook”\bis\ba\blinguistic\bphras\f.\bW\f\bus\f\b“comma\br\fwriting”\b st\fp\b in\b pr\f-proc\fssing\b st\fps\b b\ffor\f\b l\fxical\b analysis.\b By\b th\f\b st\fp,\b th\f\b phras\f\b is\b r\fwritt\fn\b to\b “a\b v\fry\b h\favy\b and\b \fxp\fnsiv\f\b book.”\b This\b “comma\b r\fwriting”\b is\b don\f\b automatically\b using\b th\f\b comma\br\fwriting\brul\fs.\bFor\bparsing\ba\bs\fnt\fnc\f,\bw\f\bbuild\ba\bparsing\bcontrol\btr\f\f\bin\bwhich\ba\bnod\f\b is\bfor\ba\bcomma-s\fparat\fd\bs\fgm\fnt.\bAt\bfirst,\ball\bnod\fs\bar\f\bconn\fct\fd\bas\bsibling\br\flation.\bWith\bth\f\b knowl\fdg\f\babout\bth\f\bs\fgm\fnt\br\flationships,\ba\bnod\f\bfor\bmodifi\fr\bs\fgm\fnt\bb\fcom\fs\bchild\bnod\f\bof\b a\bnod\f\bfor\bmodifi\fd\bs\fgm\fnt\band\bon\f\bnod\f\bin\bth\f\btr\f\f\bis\bs\fl\fct\fd\bas\broot.\bA\bs\fgm\fnt\binclud\fd\bin\b a\b nod\f\b is\b pars\fd\b s\fparat\fly,\b but\b parsing\b r\fsult\b of\b a\b s\fgm\fnt\b in\b a\b child\b nod\f\b participat\fs\b in\b parsing\b a\b s\fgm\fnt\b of\b a\b par\fnt\b nod\f.\b Wh\fn\b a\b s\fgm\fnt\b includ\fd\b in\b th\f\b root\b nod\f\b is\b pars\fd,\b all\b parsing\br\fsults\bof\both\fr\bs\fgm\fnts\bar\f\bus\fd\bto\bbuild\bparsing\btr\f\fs\bfor\bth\f\bwhol\f\bs\fnt\fnc\f.\bThis\bis\b th\f\b work\b don\f\b in\b th\f\b “synth\fsis\b of\b r\fsults”\b st\fp\b in\b Figur\f\b 2.\b Th\fn,\b a\b r\fsulting\b pars\f\b tr\f\f\b is\b pass\fd\bto\b\tor\fan\bg\fn\fration\bmodul\f\b(Yang,\b1997).\b

sections.title: 3.1 Target\bSyntactic\b\tateg\fries\b
paragraphs: W\f\bchoos\f\b7\bcat\fgori\fs\bas\bth\f\bpr\fdiction\btarg\ft:\bSUBCL,\bRLCL,\bNP,\bVP,\bPP,\bAJP,\bAVP.\bTh\f\b abov\f\b choic\f\b is\b bas\fd\b on\b th\f\b \fxp\fri\fnc\f\b during\b translation\b t\fst\b for\b English-\tor\fan\b machin\f\b translation\bsyst\fm,\bSmarTran.\b

\b S\fnt\fnc\f\b S\fgm\fntation\b by\bcommas\b S\fgm\fnts\b Syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b Intra-s\fnt\fnc\f\b s\fgm\fntation\b S\fgm\fnt\b parsing\b S\fl\fction\bof\b parsing\br\fsults\b S\fgm\fnt\b parsing\b r\fsults\b Synth\fsis\bof\b r\fsults\b S\fnt\fnc\f\b structur\f\b 712 \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b Figure\b3:\bG\fn\fration\bproc\fss\bof\bth\f\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\brul\fs\band\bfunctions.\b

sections.title: 3.2 \t\fllecting\bExamples\bf\fr\bTraining\bData\b
paragraphs: In\b this\b st\fp,\b w\f\b coll\fct\b phras\fs\b and\b claus\fs\b for\b th\f\btarg\ft\b cat\fgori\fs\b from\b th\f\b P\fnn\b Tr\f\fbank\b
corpus.\b In\b proc\fssing\b th\f\b corpus\b for\b coll\fcting\b \fxampl\fs\b for\b syntactic\b cat\fgori\fs,\b w\f\b s\fparat\f\b

tag”\band\bits\bcat\fgory.\bFigur\f\b4\bshows\bsom\f\bcoll\fct\fd\b\fxampl\fs.\b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b Figure\b4:\bColl\fct\fd\b\fxampl\fs\bfor\btraining\bdata\bg\fn\fration.\b \b In\b Figur\f\b 4,\b (a)\b is\b th\f\b parsing\b r\fsult\b for\b “Pierre Vin\ben\t 61 \fears old\t will join the board s a nonexecutive director Nov. 29.”\bThis\bis\ban\b\fxampl\f\b of\b th\f\b P\fnn\b Tr\f\fbank\b corpus\b from\b which\b Targ\ft\bcat\fgory\b Exampl\fs\b F\fatur\f\bd\fsign\b Training\b data\b Statistical\b data\b

D\fcision\b tr\f\fs\b H\furistic\b function\b N\fural\b n\ftwork\b Cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b rul\fs\b Cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b function\b P\fnn\b Tr\f\fbank\b corpus\b Training\b data\b Cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b function\b (\b(S\b (NP-SBJ\b\b(NP\b(NNP\bPi\frr\f)\b(NNP\bVink\fn)\b)\b\b(,\b,)\b (ADJP\b\b(NP\b(CD\b61)\b(NNS\by\fars)\b)\b(JJ\bold)\b)\b(,\b,)\b)\b (VP\b(MD\bwill)\b\b(VP\b(VP\bjoin)\b(NP\b(DT\bth\f)\b(NN\bboard)\b)\b

\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\p\b\b(NP-TMP\b(NNP\bNov.)\b(CD\b29)\b)))\b (.\b.)\b))\b (a)\b Pi\frr\f/NNP\bVink\fn/NNP\bNP\b 61/CD\by\fars/NNS\bold/JJ\bAJP\b will/MD\bjoin/VB\bth\f/DT\bboard/NN\bas/IN\ba/DT\bnon\fx\fcutiv\f/JJ\bdir\fctor/NN\bNov./NNP\b 29/CD\bVP\b (b)\b 713 w\f\bg\fn\frat\f\b\fxampl\fs\bas\bin\b(b).\bTh\fr\f\bar\f\bthr\f\f\bs\fgm\fnts\bs\fparat\fd\bby\bcommas\bas\bshown\bin\b(b).\b In\b (b),\b th\f\b last\b bold\b font\b words\b (NP,\bAJP,\bVP)\b ar\f\b th\f\b cat\fgory\b of\b th\fir\b s\fgm\fnt.\b Th\fy\b ar\f\b \fxampl\fs\bfrom\bwhich\bw\f\bconstruct\btraining\bdata\bfor\bth\f\bg\fn\fration\bof\bth\f\bpr\fdiction\brul\fs\band\b functions.\b

sections.title: 3.3 Feature\bDesign\b
paragraphs: W\f\bus\f\b7\bf\fatur\fs\bwhich\bmust\bb\f\bconsid\fr\fd\bin\bd\ft\frmining\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory.\bTh\fy\bar\f\bfirst\b word/tag\band\bth\f\bs\fcond\bword/tag\bof\bth\f\bs\fgm\fnt,\bth\f\blast\btag,\bth\f\bl\fngth\bof\b th\f\b s\fgm\fnt,\b and\b th\f\bclu\f\bfor\bth\f\bclaus\f.\b Th\f\b last\b f\fatur\f,\b clu\f\b for\b th\f\b claus\f,\b r\fpr\fs\fnts\b wh\fth\fr\b som\f\b part-of-sp\f\fch\fs\b \fxist\b in\b th\f\b s\fgm\fnt,\b which\b ar\f\b for\b th\f\b r\flativ\f\b pronoun\b (WDT,\b WP)\b and\b can\b b\f\b a\b main\bv\frb\bof\ba\bclaus\f\b(MD,\bVBD,\bVBZ,\band\bVBP).\b

sections.title: 3.4 Training\bData\b&\bGenerati\fn\b\ff\bPredicti\fn\bRules\band\bFuncti\fns\b
paragraphs: This\bs\fction\bd\fscrib\fs\btraining\bdata\band\bg\fn\fration\bproc\fss\bof\bth\f\bpr\fdiction\brul\fs\band\bfunctions.\b Figur\f\b5\bshows\bsom\f\b\fxampl\fs\bof\btraining\bdata\bfor\bd\fcision\btr\f\fs\band\bn\fural\bn\ftwork.\bIn\bFigur\f\b 5,\b (a)\b is\b th\f\b \fxampl\fs\b in\b Figur\f\b 4\b from\b which\b w\f\b g\fn\frat\f\b (b)\b and\b (c).\b Th\f\b training\b data\b for\b d\fcision\btr\f\f\bl\farning\bis\b(b),\band\b(c)\bis\bfor\bn\fural\bn\ftwork.\bW\f\bdiscr\ftiz\f\bth\f\bword\bf\fatur\fs\bto\b th\f\bnum\frical\bvalu\fs.\b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b Figure\b5:\bExampl\fs\bof\btraining\bdata.\b \b Of\b 22,112\b training\b data,\b w\f\b us\f\b 3,000\b data\b for\b validation\b and\b th\f\b r\fmains\b for\b n\fural\b n\ftwork\b training.\b W\f\b adopt\b \farly\b stopping\b to\b t\frminat\f\b th\f\b training\b at\b th\f\b point\b wh\fr\f\b th\f\b validation\b \frror\bincr\fas\fs.\bTh\f\bscal\fd\bconjugat\f\bgradi\fnt\b(Moll\fr,\b1993)\bis\bus\fd\bfor\bth\f\btraining\balgorithm.\b Th\f\bn\fural\bn\ftwork\bconsists\bof\btwo\bhidd\fn\blay\frs,\bwh\fr\f\bw\f\bus\f\btansig\b(hyp\fr\btang\fnt)\bfunction,\b and\b output\b lay\fr,\b wh\fr\f\b w\f\b us\f\bsig\b (sigmoid)\b function.\b Aft\fr\b using\b various\b n\fural\b n\ftwork\b structur\fs,\b w\f\b s\fl\fct\b th\f\b mod\fl\b which\b shows\b th\f\b l\fast\b validation\b \frror.\b Th\f\b r\fsulting\b n\fural\b n\ftwork\b has\b 15\b nod\fs\b at\b first\b hidd\fn\b lay\fr,\b 10\b nod\fs\b at\b s\fcond\b hidd\fn\b lay\fr,\b and\b 7\b targ\ft\b n\furons.\b

W\f\b us\f\b a\b simpl\f\b probability\b function\b bas\fd\b on\b Bay\fs’\b rul\f\b as\b a\b bas\flin\f\b for\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction.\b Giv\fn\b a\b s\fgm\fnt,\b w\f\b consid\fr\b th\f\b first\b tag,\b th\f\b s\fcond\b and\b th\f\b last\b tags.\b W\f\b calculat\f\b th\f\b probability\b of\b a\b s\fgm\fnt\b cat\fgory\bC,\b giv\fn\b abov\f\b thr\f\f\b tags\b which\b ar\f\b from\b th\f\b s\fgm\fnt.\bThus,\bth\f\bmost\bprobabl\f\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\bC’\bis\bd\ft\frmin\fd\bas\bfollows:\b \b \b\b\b\b\b )\btagsthr\f\fPr( )|\btagsthr\f\fPr()Pr( maxarg\b\b\b\b)\btagsthr\f\f|Pr(maxarg' CC

CC CC == \b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b(1)\b \b Pi\frr\f/NNP\bVink\fn/NNP\bNP\b 61/CD\by\fars/NNS\bold/JJ\bAJP\b will/MD\b join/VB\b th\f/DT\b board/NN\b as/IN\b a/DT\b non\fx\fcutiv\f/JJ\b dir\fctor/NN\b Nov./NNP\b 29/CD\bVP\b

sections.title: 4 Experiment\b\b 4.1 Data\b
paragraphs: W\f\bg\fn\frat\f\bth\f\btraining\band\bth\f\bt\fst\bdata\bfrom\bth\f\bP\fnn\bTr\f\fbank\bcorpus.\bIn\bcoll\fcting\btraining\b data\bd\fscrib\fd\bin\bs\fction\b3.4,\bth\f\bparsing\br\fsults\bof\b19,697\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\bfrom\bWall\bStr\f\ft\bJournal\b ar\f\b us\fd.\b Tabl\f\b 1\b shows\b th\f\b distribution\b of\b th\f\b training\b data\b according\b to\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgori\fs.\b In\b th\f\b tabl\f,\b “#\b of\b data”\b m\fans\b th\f\b numb\fr\b of\b comma-s\fparat\fd\b s\fgm\fnts.\b For\b cat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bt\fst,\bw\f\b\fxtract\bdata\bfrom\bWall\bStr\f\ft\bJournal,\bBrown\bcorpus,\bIBM\bmanual,\b and\bECTB\b(English\bChin\fs\f\bTr\f\f\bBank)\bcorpus.\bW\f\bus\f\bs\fv\fral\bdomains\bto\bg\ft\bt\fst\bdata\bfrom\b much\bdiff\fr\fnt\bdomains\bas\bpossibl\f.\bThis\bis\bwhy\bw\f\btry\bto\bshow\bthat\bth\f\bpropos\fd\bm\fthod\bwill\b b\f\bdomain-ind\fp\fnd\fnt.\bTabl\f\b2\bshows\b th\f\b distribution\b of\b th\f\b t\fst\b data.\b W\f\b construct\b anoth\fr\b v\frsion\bof\bdata\bfor\bm\fasuring\bhow\bmuch\bth\f\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bwould\bcontribut\f\bto\bimproving\b translation\bquality.\bW\f\b\fxtract\b100\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\bfrom\bcomput\fr\band\bpolitics\bdomains,\bWall\bStr\f\ft\b Journal,\band\bhigh\bschool\bEnglish\bt\fxt\bbook,\br\fsulting\bin\b400\bt\fst\bs\fnt\fnc\fs.\b \b Table\b1:\bDistribution\bof\bth\f\btraining\bdata.\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\b\bTable\b2:\bT\fst\bdata\bfor\bpr\fdiction\baccuracy\b\fvaluation.\b
\b Targ\ft\bcat\fgory\b #\bof\bdata\b NP\b 14,091\b VP\b 1,499\b AJP\b 3,806\b AVP\b 334\b PP\b 1,585\b SUBCL\b 751\b RLCL\b 46\b Total\b 22,112\b \b

sections.title: 4.2 Evaluati\fn\b\ff\b\tateg\fry\bPredicti\fn\bMeth\fds\b
paragraphs: For\b p\frformanc\f\b comparison,\b w\f\b us\f\b 4\b m\fthods\b for\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction.\b Thr\f\f\b of\b th\fm\b ar\f\b d\fscrib\fd\b in\b s\fction\b 3.4\b (d\fcision\b tr\f\fs,\b n\fural\b n\ftworks,\b a\b h\furistic\b probability\b function).\b In\b addition,\b w\f\b us\f\b a\b pr\fdiction\b m\fthod\b by\b human-built\b rul\fs\b which\b w\fr\f\b coll\fct\fd\b during\b d\fv\flopm\fnt\bof\bEnglish-\tor\fan\bMT\bsyst\fm,\ba\bt\fst\bb\fd\bof\bth\f\br\fs\farch.\bTh\f\baccuracy\bis\bd\ffin\fd\b as\b th\f\b numb\fr\b of\b corr\fct\b pr\fdiction\b ov\fr\b all\b comma-s\fparat\fd\b s\fgm\fnts\b in\b t\fst\b data.\b Tabl\f\b 3\b shows\bth\f\bcomparison\br\fsult.\bTh\f\bb\fst\baccuracy\bin\b\fach\bdomain\bis\bindicat\fd\bby\bbold\bfont\bdigits.\b Th\f\b pr\fdiction\b rul\fs\b g\fn\frat\fd\b by\b th\f\b d\fcision\b tr\f\f\b l\farning\b (DT)\b shows\b th\f\b b\fst\b pr\fdiction\b accuracy\bin\ball\bdomains.\b\b

\b \b DT\b Prob.\bfunction\b Human-built\brul\fs\b N\fural\bn\ftwork\b WSJ\b 97\b 92\b 88\b 95\b Brown\b 94\b 88\b 83\b 91\b IBM\b 97\b 78\b 85\b 86\b ECTB\b 97\b 90\b 90\b 96\b Av\frag\f\b96\b 89.1\b 87.1\b 93.4\b Domain\b #\bof\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\b #\bof\bdata\b WSJ\b 4,000\b 4,626\b Brown\b 4,001\b 3,821\b IBM\b 4,404\b 1,403\b ECTB\b 3,825\b 4,834\b Total\b 16,230\b 14,684\b 715 \b Figur\f\b 6\b shows\b som\f\b \fxampl\fs\b th\f\b pr\fdiction\b rul\fs\b conv\frt\fd\b from\b th\f\b d\fcision\b tr\f\f\b r\fsults.\b Th\f\brul\fs\br\fad\boff\bfrom\bth\f\bd\fcision\btr\f\fs\bhav\f\bth\f\badvantag\f\bthat\bth\fy\bar\f\b\fasy\bto\bint\frpr\ft\band\b to\b b\f\b improv\fd\b by\b an\b additional\b \frror\b corr\fction\b proc\fss,\b whil\f\b it\b is\b difficult\b to\b int\frpr\ft\b th\f\b pr\fdiction\bproc\fss\bby\bth\f\bprobability\bfunction\bor\bn\fural\bn\ftwork\bm\fthods.\b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b \b Figure\b6:\bExampl\fs\bof\bpr\fdiction\brul\fs\bfrom\bd\fcision\btr\f\f\bl\farning.\b

sections.title: 4.3 Evaluati\fn\b\ff\bTranslati\fn\bQuality\bImpr\fvement\b
paragraphs: W\f\bint\fgrat\f\b155\bpr\fdiction\brul\fs\br\fad\boff\bfrom\bth\f\bd\fcision\btr\f\fs\bwith\bth\f\bEnglish-\tor\fan\bMT\b syst\fm\b to\b \fvaluat\f\b th\f\b translation\b quality\b improv\fm\fnt\b by\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction.\b Th\f\bE\tMT\bsyst\fm\bp\frforms\brul\f-bas\fd\banalysis\band\badopts\bidiom\btranslation\bapproach.\b

Figur\f\b 2\b in\b s\fction\b 2\b shows\b th\f\b parsing\b st\fps\b in\b our\b MT\b syst\fm.\b Th\fr\f\b is\b a\b pr\fdiction\b proc\fss\b b\ffor\f\b “s\fgm\fnt\b parsing”,\b “s\fl\fction\b of\b parsing\b r\fsults”\b and\b “synth\fsis\b of\b r\fsults.”\b Thus,\b a\b pr\fdict\fd\b cat\fgory\b can\b b\f\b us\fd\b to\b guid\f\b th\f\b s\fgm\fnt\b parsing\b and\b th\f\b s\fl\fction\b of\b s\fgm\fnt\b parsing\b r\fsult.\b Also\b th\f\b id\fntifi\fd\b r\flationships\b among\b s\fgm\fnts\b by\b th\f\b pr\fdict\fd\b cat\fgory\bcan\bh\flp\b“synth\fsis\bof\br\fsult”.\bBy\bthis,\bw\f\b\fxp\fct\bth\f\btranslation\bquality\bimprov\fm\fnt.\b

Tabl\f\b 4\b shows\b th\f\b r\fsults\b of\b translation\b \fvaluation\b by\b s\fv\fn\b p\fopl\f.\b Th\fy\b compar\f\b two\b translation\br\fsults\bby\bmarking\bb\ftt\fr/\fqual/wors\f.\bIn\bth\f\btabl\f,\b“Equal”\bm\fans\bthat\bth\f\b\fvaluator\b thinks\bth\f\btwo\btranslation\br\fsults\bhav\f\bth\f\bsam\f\bm\faning\bor\bit\bis\bdifficult\bto\bid\fntify\bth\f\bsup\frior\b translation.\b Th\f\b r\fsults\b indicat\f\b th\f\b fact\b that\b th\f\b introduction\b of\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b contribut\fd\b to\b g\fn\frating\b mor\f\b th\f\b b\ftt\fr\b translations\b than\b th\f\b wors\f\b translations.\b In\b ord\fr\b to\b sp\f\fd\b up\b translation\b it\b mak\fs\b s\fns\f\b to\b split\b long\b s\fnt\fnc\fs\b into\b s\fgm\fnts\b and\b translat\f\b th\fm\b on\f-by-on\f.\b How\fv\fr,\b this\b n\fgl\fcts\b th\f\b long-distanc\f\b d\fp\fnd\fnci\fs,\b which\b can\b l\fad\b to\b additional\btranslation\b\frrors.\bIf\bth\f\bparsing\balgorithm\bconsid\frs\bth\f\blong-distanc\f\bd\fp\fnd\fnci\fs\b among\bsplit\bs\fgm\fnts\bby\busing\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\br\fsults,\bit\bis\bpossibl\f\bto\br\fcov\fr\bfrom\bthos\f\b \frrors.\b As\b a\b r\fsult,\b w\f\b conclud\f\b that\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b can\b play\b a\b rol\f\b for\b th\f\b translation\bquality\bimprov\fm\fnt.\b \b

Table\b4:\bTranslation\bquality\bimprov\fm\fnt.\b \b \b B\ftt\fr\b Equal\b Wors\f\b WSJ\b 56\b 18\b 26\b Comput\fr\b 53\b 11\b 36\b Politics\b 60\b 12\b 28\b T\fxt\bbook\b 66\b 10\b 24\b Total\b 235\b(58.8%)\b 51\b(12.7%)\b 114\b(28.5%)\b

setTa\bgetCatego\by( SUBCL ); \betu\bn; } if (\the\tk_IN(fi\bstT\bees) && \the\tkClauseExist(_NONE) && \the\tk_NNP(se\tondT\bees)) { setTa\bgetCatego\by( PP ); \betu\bn; } if (\the\tk_CD(fi\bstT\bees) && \the\tk_NONE(lastT\bees)) {

sections.title: 5 \t\fnclusi\fn\b
paragraphs: This\b pap\fr\b propos\fs\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\bto\b improv\f\b th\f\b translation\b quality\b in\b English-\tor\fan\b machin\f\b translation.\b W\f\b construct\b th\f\b pr\fdiction\b rul\fs\b and\b functions\b using\b statistical\band\bmachin\f\bl\farning\bm\fthods.\bIn\bparsing\blong\bs\fnt\fnc\fs,\bth\f\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\bar\f\bsplit\binto\b short\fr\bs\fgm\fnts\bby\bcommas.\bTh\f\bpurpos\f\bof\bth\f\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bis\bto\bimprov\f\bth\f\b translation\bquality\bby\bid\fntifying\br\flationships\bamong\bcomma-s\fparat\fd\bs\fgm\fnts\b and\b guiding\b th\f\bs\fl\fction\bof\bth\f\baccurat\f\banalysis\br\fsults\bof\bth\f\bs\fgm\fnts.\b

W\f\bconstruct\btraining\bdata\busing\bth\f\bP\fnn\bTr\f\fbank\bcorpus.\bW\f\bapply\bd\fcision\btr\f\f\bl\farning\b and\bth\f\bn\fural\bn\ftwork\bl\farning\bfor\bth\f\bg\fn\fration\bof\bth\f\bpr\fdiction\brul\fs\band\bth\f\bfunctions.\bTh\f\b rul\fs\bby\bth\f\bd\fcision\btr\f\f\bl\farning\bshow\bth\f\bb\fst\bpr\fdiction\baccuracy,\bso\bth\fy\bar\f\bint\fgrat\fd\binto\b th\f\b English-\tor\fan\b MT\b syst\fm.\b Th\f\b pr\fdict\fd\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b is\b us\fd\b to\b id\fntify\b s\fgm\fnt\b r\flationships\band\bs\fl\fct\bth\f\bpars\f\btr\f\fs\bfor\bth\f\banalyz\fd\bs\fgm\fnts.\bTh\f\bpars\fr\bdo\fs\bnot\bconsid\fr\b th\f\b pr\fdict\fd\b cat\fgory\b wh\fn\b g\fn\frating\b pars\f\b tr\f\fs\b for\b th\f\b s\fgm\fnts.\b Th\f\b propos\fd\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bis\bnot\bfor\bth\f\bg\fn\fral\bpars\fr,\bbut\bfor\bth\f\btranslation-adapt\fd\bpars\fr.\bThat\bis,\b th\f\b syntactic\b cat\fgory\b pr\fdiction\b aims\b to\b only\b improv\f\b th\f\b translation\b quality.\b Through\b th\f\b translation\b \fvaluation,\b w\f\b know\b that\b th\f\b pr\fdiction\b contribut\fs\b to\b improving\b th\f\b translation\b quality.\b

In\b ord\fr\b to\b improv\f\b th\f\b pr\fdiction\b accuracy,\b approach\fs\b using\b oth\fr\b classifi\frs,\b such\b as\b SVM\band\bmaximum\b\fntropy,\bwill\bb\f\bconsid\fr\fd.\b\bTh\f\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bcan\bb\f\bus\fd\b to\bfilt\fr\bth\f\bparsing\brul\fs\bso\bthat\bparsing\b\fffici\fnci\fs\bin\btim\f/spac\f\bmay\bb\f\bimprov\fd.\bW\f\b\fxp\fct\b that\bth\f\bsyntactic\bcat\fgory\bpr\fdiction\bwill\bcontribut\f\bto\bd\fsigning\bth\f\bn\fw\bapproach\bto\bparsing\b of\blong\bs\fnt\fnc\fs\bcompos\fd\bof\bcomma-s\fparat\fd\bs\fgm\fnts.\b

sections.title: References\b
paragraphs: \tim,\bS.-D.\b2005.\bIntra-s\fnt\fnc\f\bS\fgm\fntation\bbas\fd\bon\bMaximum\bEntropy\bMod\fl\bfor\bEffici\fnt\b English\bSyntactic\bAnalysis.\bJournal of Korean Information Science Societ\f,\b32(5),\b385-395.\b

\tim,\bS.\bD.\band\bY.T.\b\tim.\b1995.\bS\fnt\fnc\f\bAnalysis\busing\bPatt\frn\bMatching\bin\bEnglish-\tor\fan\b Machin\f\bTranslation.\bIn International Conference on Computer Processing on Oriental Languages,\bpp.\b199-\b206.\b
\tim,\bS.-D.\band\bY.T.\b\tim.\b1997.\bIntra-s\fnt\fnc\f\bS\fgm\fntation\bfor\bEffici\fnt\bEnglish\bSyntactic\b Analysis. Journal of Korean Information Science Societ\f,\b24(8),\b884-890.\b
Yang,\bS.H.\b1997.\bTransf\fr\bof\bLinguistic\bStyl\f\bfor\bEnglish-to-\tor\fan\bMachin\f\bTranslation.\b Ph.D Dissertation of Seoul National Universit\f.\b 717
